common.tryAgainLater: Por favor, inténtalo de nuevo más tarde.
cocktails.emptyMy: Mark ingredients you have to see available cocktails here.
cocktails.emptyFavorites: Rate cocktails and/or adjust the rating threshold in the menu.
cocktails.helpMyText: This screen shows cocktails you can make with your current ingredients.\n\nUse search to find your recipes quickly, and use filters to narrow the list by tags or method.
cocktails.helpFavoritesText: This screen shows cocktails you ranked.\n\nUse search and filters to find what you want faster.
cocktails.helpAllText: This screen shows the full cocktail collection.\n\nUse search, switch tabs, and apply filters by method or tags.
ingredients.emptyMy: Mark ingredients you have to see them here.
ingredients.helpMyText: This screen shows ingredients you have.\n\nSearch by name, and use tag filters to quickly organise your personal collection.
ingredients.helpAllText: This screen shows the full ingredients list.\n\nUse search and tags to quickly find what you need.
ingredients.helpShoppingText: This screen shows ingredients you want to buy.\n\nMark ingredients as available after purchase to move them into My ingredients.
ingredientForm.mediaLibraryAccessMessage: Enable photo library permissions in system settings to add an ingredient image.
ingredientForm.cameraAccessRequiredMessa: Enable camera permissions in system settings to take an ingredient photo.
ingredientForm.addPhotoMessage: Choose how you want to add an ingredient photo.

ingredientForm.baseDisableBrandedVariant: This ingredient is a base for branded ingredients, so it cannot be branded itself.
ingredientForm.baseDisableStyledIngredie: Styled ingredients cannot be branded. Remove style link to enable base ingredient selection.
ingredientForm.styleDisableStyledVariant: This ingredient is a base for styled ingredients, so it cannot be styled itself.
ingredientForm.styleDisableBrandedIngred: Branded ingredients cannot be styled. Remove base ingredient link to enable style selection.
ingredientForm.name: Name
ingredientForm.baseHint: Only ingredients that are not already branded can be selected as base ingredients.
ingredientForm.styleHint: Only base ingredients that are not branded and not already styled can be selected as styles.
ingredientForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Add tasting notes or usage suggestions
ingredientForm.helpMessage:
Use this screen to create a new ingredient card.

Add a name, optional photo, tags, base ingredient or style ingredient, and notes, then tap Save.

A style ingredient can only link to a base ingredient that is neither branded nor styled.
cocktailForm.mediaAccessRequiredMessage: Enable photo library permissions in system settings to add a cocktail photo.
cocktailForm.cameraAccessRequiredMessage: Enable camera permissions in system settings to take a cocktail photo.
cocktailForm.addPhotoMessage: Choose how you want to add a cocktail photo.
cocktailForm.recipeRequiredMessage: Add at least one ingredient to the cocktail.
cocktailForm.deleteConfirmNamed:
Are you sure you want to delete
{{name}}?

This action cannot be undone.
cocktailForm.deleteConfirmUnnamed: Are you sure you want to delete this cocktail?\n\nThis action cannot be undone.
cocktailForm.leaveWithoutSavingMessage: Your changes will be lost if you leave this screen.
cocktailForm.name: Name
cocktailForm.helpMessage: Use this screen to build a new cocktail recipe.\n\nFill in name, photo, tags, ingredients, method, and instructions, then tap Save.
cocktailForm.allowBaseSubstituteMessage: If the specified ingredient isn't available, the cocktail will be shown as available with its base ingredient.
cocktailForm.allowBrandedSubstituteMessa: If the specified ingredient isn't available, the cocktail will be shown as available with branded ingredients of the base.
cocktailForm.allowStyleSubstitutesMessag: If the specified styled ingredient isn't available, the cocktail will be shown as available with its style base ingredient or other styles of the same base.
cocktailDetails.title: Cocktail details
cocktailDetails.helpMessage:
This screen shows cocktail details, ingredients, and instructions.

Use the buttons under the cocktail to copy or edit it.

**Ingredient ribbons**
Left ribbon marks ingredient type:
blue = brand ingredient,
yellow = style ingredient.

Right ribbon marks base variants:
blue = has branded variants,
yellow = has style variants.
cocktailMethod.blend.label: Blend
cocktailMethod.blend.description: Blend with crushed ice into a frozen texture.
cocktailMethod.muddle.label: Muddle
cocktailMethod.muddle.description: Press fruit, berries, or herbs to release oils and juice.
cocktailMethod.heat.label: Heat
cocktailMethod.heat.description: Warm ingredients gently to blend flavours without boiling.
cocktailMethod.shake.label: Shake
cocktailMethod.shake.description: Shake with ice. Best for citrus, syrup, cream, or egg white to aerate and chill.
cocktailMethod.stir.label: Stir
cocktailMethod.stir.description: Stir with a bar spoon in a mixing glass full of ice. Best for herbal mixers.
cocktailMethod.throw.label: Throw
cocktailMethod.throw.description: Pour between tins from a distance to aerate without cloudiness.
cocktailMethod.build.label: Build
cocktailMethod.build.description: Pour ingredients directly into the serving glass.
cocktailMethod.layer.label: Layer
cocktailMethod.layer.description: Float ingredients in layers using a bar spoon for visual effect.
ingredientDetails.title: Ingredient details
ingredientDetails.affiliateDisclosureMes:
Some Amazon links in this app are affiliate links. If you buy something, we may earn a small commission at no extra cost to you.

This helps support the development of the app.
Thank you for your support!
ingredientDetails.helpMessage:
This screen shows ingredient details, links, and related cocktails.

Use the button under the ingredient to edit it.

**Cocktail ribbons**
Left ribbon shows what's inside:
blue = has brand ingredients,
yellow = has style ingredients.

Right ribbon shows fallback:
blue = brand fallback exists,
yellow = style fallback exists.
ingredientDetails.removeBaseMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink {{name}} from its base ingredient?
ingredientDetails.removeStyleMessage: Are you sure you want to unlink {{name}} from its style ingredient?
shaker.helpBase: This screen helps you select ingredients and understand what you can mix right now.\n\nUse search to find ingredients quickly, tap ingredients to mark them to use, and open shaker results for matching cocktails.
onboarding.step1.message: **Welcome!**\nLet’s set up your bar by adding a few ingredients.
onboarding.step2.message: Tap **Ingredients** to start adding what you have.
onboarding.step3.message: Here’s the full ingredients list.\nWe’ve already marked a few common basics for you.
onboarding.step4.message: **My ingredients** shows what you have.\nYou’ll also see how many available cocktails use each ingredient.
onboarding.step5.message: Now let’s check the cocktails.\nOpen the **Cocktails** screen.
onboarding.step6.message: At the top of **My cocktails** you’ll see cocktails you can make now.\n\nBelow are cocktails missing just one ingredient.
onboarding.step7.message: Meet the **Shaker**.\nIt helps you find cocktails based on selected ingredients.
onboarding.step8.message:
**Shaker logic**
Ingredients from the same category can replace each other (*OR*).
Ingredients from different categories are required together (*AND*).

**Example**
(Gin *OR* Whiskey) *AND* (Cola *OR* Tonic) *AND* (Lemon *OR* Lime).
onboarding.step9.message: Use this toggle to show only ingredients you have.
onboarding.step10.message: Tap a few ingredients, then hit **Show** to see matching cocktails.
onboarding.step11.message: Start by marking ingredients you already have in **All ingredients**.\n\nCheers!
ingredients.emptyShopping: There are no ingredients in your\nshopping list yet.
ingredients.helpAllFullText:
This screen displays all ingredients in the app.

Use search, switch tabs, and filter by tags.

Tap a checkbox to mark availability.
cocktails.oneMoreIngredientForMore: One more ingredient for more cocktails
shakerResults.helpText: This screen shows cocktails you can make with selected ingredients.\n\nUse search and filters to narrow results, then open any cocktail to view recipe details and preparation steps.
tabBar.leaveWithoutSavingMessage: Your changes will be lost if you leave this screen.
sideMenu.useImperialCaption: Use oz instead of ml and grams
sideMenu.smartShakerFilteringInfoMessage:
When enabled, ingredients in groups with no current selection are hidden if they would produce zero results.

In groups where you already selected at least one ingredient, items stay visible to preserve OR logic.

Turn this off to restore the default shaker behaviour.
sideMenu.amazonStoreModalDescription: Override automatic detection to choose your preferred Amazon store.
sideMenu.reportIssueCaption: Report a bug, share an idea
sideMenu.backupRestoreCaption: Save your data, restore from a backup
sideMenu.restoreBundledDataDescription: Built-in changes will be lost, your own content is safe
sideMenu.restoreBundledDataConfirmMessag: This will restore the bundled cocktails and ingredients.\nYour custom cocktails and ingredients will stay the same.
sideMenu.backupUnavailableMessage: Load your inventory before backing up data.
sideMenu.sharingUnavailableMessage: Sharing is not available on this device.
sideMenu.importReadArchiveFailed: Unable to read the selected archive.
sideMenu.importMissingInventory: The backup archive is missing inventory data.
sideMenu.importInvalidInventory: The backup archive contains invalid inventory data.
sideMenu.importRetryWithValidArchive: Please try again with a valid backup archive.
sideMenu.emailUnavailableMessage: Please send your report to your.bar.app@gmail.com manually.
sideMenu.favoritesRatingModalDescription: Choose the minimum rating to show on Favourites
sideMenu.backupDataDescription: Export cocktails, ingredients, and photos as one archive
sideMenu.restoreDataDescription: Import cocktails, ingredients, and photos from archive
